name: Super Massive Hotel (please believe me)
description:
== VIDEO DEVLOG COMING SOON ==

Howdy everyone, thanks for taking a look at my new game!
This game was made in 72 Hours for the Indietales Game Jam - with the theme of "One Room"! Obviously this game doesn't relate to the theme, because the hotel is very large and has many, many rooms and there isn't anything suspicious going on whatsoever, why - did someone ask about it?
Err, anyway - hope you have fun giving my game a try!

This time I truly did everything by myself (including the music - yikes), so this was quite an undertaking for me!
I wasn't able to finish everything that I wanted to, but I think I have a pretty fun version of the game idea I had in my mind, so that's gotta count for something, huh?

Let me know what you think!
